name: Crab and Shrimp Pasta Salad
author: LLUV7877
summary: Imitation crab meat and mini shrimp make for a wonderful pasta salad that everyone loves!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked tri-colored spiral pasta
1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
1  red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add the pasta, and cook until tender, about 10 minutes
Drain, and rinse under cold water to cool
Transfer to a large bowl, and set aside
In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper
Pour over the pasta and stir to coat
Add the crab, shrimp, tomatoes, cucumber, black olives and bell pepper; mix gently to coat with the dressing
Taste, and adjust seasoning if desired
If the pasta is too dry, mix in more mayonnaise
